alert.note: Alert for Jewell; Mitchell; Osborne (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued April 06 at 3:19AM CDT until April 07 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM THIS MORNING TO 8 PM CDT THIS EVENING... ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM TO 8 PM CDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning today, northwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts of 50 to 60 mph expected. For Thursday, northwest winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts of 60 to 65 mph expected. * WHERE...Portions of north central Kansas and central and south central Nebraska. * WHEN...The High Wind Warning for both today and Thursday is in effect from 7 AM through 8 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and possibly power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...At least patchy blowing dust and minor visibility restrictions will be possible during the high winds.
info.instruction: Use extreme caution while driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects and stay away from large trees and unsecured objects.
